Activity2.Description: SUPPORT FOR MISSION PROJECTS SUCH AS BUILDING CHURCHES OR REPAIRS AND PURCHASE OF TRANSPORTATION FOR MISSIONARIES

Activity3.Description: TRAVELS FOR MINISTERS TO TRAIN AND SUPPORT MISSIONARIES, AND TO PREACH AND TEACH THE GOSPEL OF JESUS CHRIST IN OUTREACH MEETINGS WHERE MISSIONARIES ARE WORKING AND TO SEE THAT MONEYS ARE BEING SPENT FOR REQUIRED PURPOSES OF HELPING THE POOR, NEEDY AND ORPHANS

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO SPREAD THE GOSPEL OF JESUS CHRIST BY SUPPORTING MISSIONARIES, CHURCHES AND ORPHANAGES THAT WORK WITH THE POOR, NEEDY AND ORPHANS IN FOREIGN COUNTRIES, THE USA AND IN DISASTER AREAS. THE ORGANIZATION SUPPORTS MISSIONARIES AND THEIR WORKS BY CONTRIBUTING MONEY TO THEIR WORKS. THE ORGANIZATION SUPPORTS MISSION PROJECTS SUCH AS BUILDING CHURCHES, REPAIRS AND PURCHASE OF TRANSPORTATION FOR MISSIONARIES. THE ORGANIZATION TRAINS AND SUPPORTS MINISTERS AND MISSIONARIES BY TEACHING THEM THE GOSPEL ACCORDING TO THE BIBLE.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO SPREAD THE GOSPEL OF JESUS CHRIST BY SUPPORTING MISSIONARIES, CHURCHES AND ORPHANAGES THAT WORK WITH THE POOR, NEEDY AND ORPHANS IN FOREIGN COUNTRIES, THE USA SND IN DISASTER AREAS.

IRS990ScheduleA.FactsAndCircumstancesTest: ALL SUPPORT TO DATE IS FROM CHARITABLE DONATIONS WITH A VERY LITTLE INTEREST EARNINGS. THE ORGANIZATION HAS A CHARITABLE DONOR LIST OF APPROXIMATELY 70 DONORS THROUGH OUT THE LAST 5 YEARS OF WHICH APPROXIMATELY 35 DONATED IN THE YEAR 2010. OF THE EXCESS CONTRIBUTION CONTRIBUTORS, THEY REPRESENT 6 OF THE DONORS. OF THOSE 6 EXCESS DONORS, 2 ARE RELATED ENTITIES (THAT BEING AN INDIVIDUAL WHO IS A BOARD MEMBER AND HIS CORPORATION), THREE ARE NOT RELATED IN ANY MANNER, AND 1 OTHER IS ALSO A BOARD MEMBER.IN ADDITION, FROM THE VERY BEGINNING OF THE ORGANIZATION, NONE OF THE OFFICERS OR DIRECTORS HAVE TAKEN ANY SALARY. IT IS ANTICIPATED THAT THE FUTURE WILL BE NO DIFFERENT, IN THAT NO OFFICERS OR DIRECTORS WILL BE PAID A SALARY.THIS ORGANIZATION IS TOTALLY TO SUPPORT MISSIONARIES, AND HELP THE POOR, WIDOWS AND ORPHANS. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND OFFICERS TOTALLY BELIEVE THAT THIS ORGANIZATION IS A PUBLICLY SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION AND WILL CONTINUE TO TRY TO ATTRACT THE SUPPORT FROM ADDITIONAL PUBLIC CONTRIBUTORS.IF MORE INFORMATION IS REQUIRED UNDER THESE FACTS AND CIRCUMSTANCES, PLEASE LET THE BOARD KNOW AND WE WILL PROVIDE WHATEVER SUPPORT YOU REQUEST.

AcctsActvsOutUSTable.SpecificServicesProvided: TRAIN AND SUPPORT MINISTERS AND MISSIONARIES. ASSIST SUPPORTING AND BUILDING ORPHANAGES. ASSIST IN BUILDING SMALL CHURCHES.
TRAIN AND SUPPORT MINISTERS AND MISSIONARIES.

GrantsToIndOutsideUS.TypeOfAssistance: INCOME ASSISTANCE TO OVERSEE ORPHANAGE IN BRITO. INCOME ASSISTANCE TO OVERSEE A SCHOOL IN SAN PEDRO PINULA. ASSISTANCE FOR CHILDREN AND WIDOWS. PROJECT FEEDING CHILDREN.

Form990ScheduleFPartV.Identifier: PROCEDURE FOR MONITORING GRANTS OUTSIDE THE U.S.:
Form990ScheduleFPartV.Explanation: SCHEDULE F, PART I, LINE 2: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT HAVE OFFICIAL GRANTS. THE ORGANIZATION DOES SUPPORT MISSIONARIES AND MINISTERS THAT WORK WITH THE POOR, NEEDY AND ORPHANS MAINLY IN GUATEMALA AND A SMALL AMOUNT IN INDIA, ARGENTINA, ALBANIA AND THE USA. THE ORGANIZATIONS MAIN WORK IS IN GUATEMALA WHERE THEY HELP SUPPORT APPROXIMATELY 15 MINISTERS AND MISSIONARIES THAT WORK WITH THE POOR AND ORPHANS AND SPREAD THE GOSPEL OF JESUS CHRIST IN SMALL CHURCHES. THE ORGANIZATION HAS 2 DIRECTORS THAT TRAVEL EXTENSIVELY TO GUATEMALA AND THEY HAVE HANDS ON TRAINING AND TEACHING THE MINISTERS AND MISSIONARIES, AND HENCE, SEE WHAT THE NEEDS ARE AND BASED ON THEIR RECOMMENDATIONS, THE GOVERNING BOARD ASSISTS THE MINISTERS AND MISSIONARIES FINANCIALLY BY SUPPORTING THEIR INCOME, BUILDING OR REPAIRING CHURCHES, ASSISTING IN SUPPORT FOR VEHICLES AND REPAIRS, AND BUILDING AN ORPHANAGE.

Form990ScheduleFPartV.Identifier: METHOD USED TO ACCCOUNT FOR EXPENDITURES:
Form990ScheduleFPartV.Explanation: SCHEDULE F, PART I, LINE 3: WHERE AT ALL POSSIBLE, INVOICES ARE REQUESTED TO SUPPORT MAJOR EXPENSES, OTHER THAN SUPPORT FOR INCOME TO MINISTERS AND MISSIONARIES. EXACT SAME AMOUNTS ARE DISPURSED MONTHYLY FOR SUPPORT TO MINISTERS AND MISSIONARIES. WHERE INVOICES ARE IMPOSSIBLE, THE DIRECTORS WHO TEACH AND TRAIN TRAVEL TO LOCATIONS WHERE MONIES HAVE BEEN GIVEN TO SEE THE WORK IN PROGRESS OR COMPLETION OF THE MISSION PROJECT.

Form990ScheduleFPartV.Identifier: EXPLANATION FOR ESTIMATED NUMBER OF RECIPIENTS:
Form990ScheduleFPartV.Explanation: SCHEDULE F, PART III, COL (C): 2 OF THE RECIPIENTS RECEIVE MONEY FOR THEIR WORK. THE OTHER 2 RECEIVE MONEY WHICH THEY SUPPORT WIDOWS AND CHILDREN IN THEIR PROJECT.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrant: TO HELP SUPPORT THE MINISTER AND HIS CHARITABLE WORKS.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: PROCEDURE FOR MONITORING GRANTS IN THE U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: SCHEDULE I, PART I, LINE 2: THERE ARE NO FORMAL GRANTS. THE ORGANIZATION DOES ASSIST ORGANIZATIONS THAT HAVE NEEDS TO WHICH THEY ARE HELPING THE POOR, WIDOWS AND ORPHANS. CERTAIN DIRECTORS HAVE CONNECTIONS WITH MANY MINISTERS AND HAS KNOWLEDGE THAT ASSISTANCE IS NECESSARY TO HELP SPREAD THE GOSPEL OF JESUS CHRST BY HELPING THE POOR, WIDOWS AND ORPHANS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FORM 990 WAS NOT PROVIDED TO THE ORGANIZATIONS GOVERNING BODY BEFORE IT WAS FILED. IT WILL BE REVIEWED AT THE NEXT BOARD MEETING AFTER THE FILING OF THE RETURN.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: IF ANYONE REQUESTS TO SEE OUR 1023 APPLICATION OR TAX RETURNS FORM 990-EZ OR 990, WE WILL SCHEDULE A TIME CONDUCIVE TO ALL PARTIES SO THAT THEY MAY INSPECT REQUESTED DOCUMENTS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC. SHOULD ANYONE WANT TO INSPECT THE DOCUMENTS, THE APPROPRIATE BOARD MEMBER WILL DETERMINE A CONGENIAL TIME FOR THE DOCUMENTS TO BE AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION IN THE OFFICES OF THE ORGANIZATION.
